content: shellevision bucket hat by annette corsino materials 2 skeins in contrasting colors of worsted weight cotton yarn we used cascade yarns nifty cotton effects 100% cotton 187 yards/100g size h/5mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitches used chain=chain single_crochet=single_crochet double_crochet=double_crochet slip_stitch=slipped stitch skip=skip over 1 st and work next stitch 4sh=4 double_crochet stitches in chain space 5sh=5 double_crochet sts in chain space 6sh=6 double_crochet in chain space 7sh=7 double_crochet in chain space chain space=space created from chains on previous row note yarn is held double throughout for a firmer fabric use any amount of colors in any combinations you d like ie 2 strands of yarn a 2 strands of yarn b 1 strand of a held together with 1 strand of b etc gauge 12dc=4 with yarn held double on h hook 3 5sc with yarn held double on h hook ©2023theknittingtreela 1031 w manchester blvd #2 inglewood ca 90301 theknittingtreela com instructions every row is joined with a slip_stitch and turned chain 3 9sc in magic_ring slip_stitch to join turn 10 row 1 ch1 *2sc in st 1sc in next* slip_stitch to join turn 15 row 2 ch1 *2sc in st 1sc in next 2sts slip_stitch to join turn 20 row 3 ch1 *2sc in st 1sc in next 3sts slip_stitch to join turn 25 continue in this manner increasing 5 sts each row until you have 55 sts or until hat measures 6 across note if you want to make the hat bigger or smaller this is the place to add or subtract in groups of 5 row 10 ch3 double_crochet in next 3sts ch1 sk1 *1dc in next 4 stitches ch1 sk1* slip_stitch to join turn 11-4sh row 11 chain 3 3 more double_crochet in chain 1 space *chain 2 4sh* in chain 1 space slip_stitch to join turn 11 4sh row 12 chain 3 4 more double_crochet in chain space *ch2 5sh in chain space* slip_stitch to join turn 11-5sh row 13-16 repeat row 12 row 17-18 chain 3 5 more double_crochet in chain space *ch3 6sh in chain space* slip_stitch to join turn 11-6sh row 19-20 chain 3 6 more double_crochet in chain space *chain 4 7sh in chain space* slip_stitch to join turn 11-7sh row 21 chain 1 *3 single_crochet in chain space single_crochet in next 7 sts* 110 fasten_off weave in
